summary: QA Automation Engineer with a Master degree in Computer Science, over 4 years of software and information systems QA experience. Skilled in automating web and API tests, developing test frameworks in C#, and working with CI/CD, version control, and bug tracking. Strong communication and mentoring abilities.
skills: Automation of web services and API scenarios (NUnit, Selenium, NSubstitute)
Test documentation (checklists, test cases, test plans, test reports)
Version control and CI systems (Git, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps, TeamCity)
Presentation of features to customers and stakeholders

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.description: Developed and tested QA automation; automated web and API scenarios; built test frameworks using C#; software and information systems QA.

experience.title: QA Specialist
experience.description: Performed QA activities, contributed to automation and test framework work; tested web/desktop/API; collaborated with development teams.

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.description: Developed QA automation frameworks using C#; contributed to test design and automation strategies.
